item.title: Avoid Absolute File Path When Using the cxf-codegen-plugin
item.description: I ran into this problem a few months ago and scoured the internet for solution but never found one until now. So hopefully this will be helpful to someone with the same problem. By default, the Apache CXF Codegen Maven plugin generates code that will attempt to read your wsdl via the absolute path.
